items.title: Nvidia surpasses Tesla as the No. 1 held stock on Robinhood, fueled by Gen Z interest
items.description: Is Nvidia still a worthwhile investment? Despite recent market headwinds, investors—especially young ones—are still bullish.

items.title: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick blasts Canada for ‘tone deaf’ tariff response and praises the UK and Mexico for not retaliating
items.description: Lutnick also criticized Canada because it contributes less to NATO than the U.S.

items.title: Why lowering the yield on 10-year bonds is more important to Trump than the stock market or interest rates
items.description: Roughly six in 10 U.S. adults report owning stock, but nearly 80% of American households have some type of debt.

items.title: Scott Bessent says the U.S. economy is detoxing but that doesn’t mean there will be a recession: ‘I’m not concerned about a little bit of volatility over three weeks’
items.description: The Treasury secretary echoed recent statements from President Donald Trump and Vice President JD Vance.

items.title: Illinois debated ditching its 110-year-old state flag—but voters overwhelmingly prefer a design that experts ‘hate’
items.description: "People overwhelmingly prefer our current state flag,” said Illinois Secretary of State Alexi Giannoulias.
